alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:57PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM PDT... At 255 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over interior San Luis Obispo county, about 35 miles east of San Luis Obispo. The storms were moving slowly to the north and northwest. HAZARDS...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Black Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains
